Package org.apache.hama.pipes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PipesApplication<K1,V1,K2,V2,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    This class is responsible for launching and communicating with the child process.
    PipesBSP<K1 extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V1 extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,K2 extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,V2 extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    A BSP that can communicate via pipes with other programming languages and runtimes.
    PipesNonJavaInputFormat
    Dummy input format used when non-Java a RecordReader is used by the Pipes application.
    PipesPartitioner<K,V>
    PipesPartitioner is a Wrapper for C++ Partitioner Java Partitioner -> BinaryProtocol -> C++ Partitioner and back
    Submitter
    The main entry point and job submitter.
